name: words-hunter
description: Simple word game intended to help people learning English extend their vocabulary eventually

scripts.deploy: npm run make-site; git branch -f gh-pages HEAD; git checkout gh-pages; git add -f site; git commit -m "deploy" --no-gpg-sign; git push origin `git subtree split --prefix site gh-pages`:gh-pages --force; git checkout main
scripts.make-site: npm run make-icons && npm run make-html && npm run make-css && npm run make-js
